name: Data hacker (Marcus-Lane)
description:
Hack into various systems by working out word puzzle passwords. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS: 

Use the number keys across the keyboard to select a system to hack and use enter / return to select that system. 

Once in the system you will be present with a scrambled password, unscramble the password, type it in and press enter / return, if correctly spelt you will be granted access tot he system. However, if you spelt the word wrong you will have to try again against a new scrambled password.  Be sure to check your spellings, words are case sensitive. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
